alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 18 at 12:39AM MST until December 18 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...West to southwest winds 30 to 40 MPH with gusts up to 60 MPH. * WHERE...North Snowy Range Foothills including Arlington and Elk Mountain along Interstate 80 between Laramie and Rawlins, Central Laramie Range and southwest Platte County including Bordeaux along Interstate 25 between Chugwater and Wheatland. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County
